title.narrative: Technical Assistance and Programme Management support for the implementation of the UK - India Fast Track Start-Up Programme

description.narrative: This Technical Assistance is divided into 3 broad categories: 1. Address market failures that inhibit the success of the Investee Funds which DFID supports 2. Foster entrepreneurship and strengthen UK - India linkages 3. Support robust process and lesson learning

Expenditure is being reported as aggregate of payments made by PwC to third parties for goods and services procured for the project during FY 20 quarter 2 (1st July to 30th Sep 2019). Exchange rate as on last day of the quarter has been used to convert value from INR to GBP. Exchange rates have been used from FBIL* website. *Financial Benchmarks India Private Limited (FBIL) has taken over from RBI, the computation and dissemination of reference rate for spot USD/INR and exchange rate of other major currencies with effect from July 10, 2018.

Expenditure is being reported as aggregate of payments made by PwC to third parties for goods and services procured for the project during FY 20 quarter 3 (1st October to 31st Dec 2019). Exchange rate as on last day of the quarter has been used to convert value from INR to GBP. Exchange rates have been used from FBIL* website. *Financial Benchmarks India Private Limited (FBIL) has taken over from RBI, the computation and dissemination of reference rate for spot USD/INR and exchange rate of other major currencies with effect from July 10, 2018.

"Expenditure is being reported as aggregate of payments made by PwC to third parties for goods and services procured for the project during FY 20 quarter 4 (1st January to 31st March 2020). Exchange rate as on last day of the quarter has been used to convert value from INR to GBP. Exchange rates have been used from FBIL* website. *Financial Benchmarks India Private Limited (FBIL) has taken over from RBI, the computation and dissemination of reference rate for spot USD/INR and exchange rate of other major currencies with effect from July 10, 2018."
